string.text:
Small brass casings with primers for handgun ammunition.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Ammo Part

Plastic shells with brass primers used to make shotgun ammunition.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Ammo Part

Medium-sized brass casings with primers for rifle ammunition.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Ammo Part

Large brass casings with primers for full-sized rifle ammunition.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Ammo Part

Fast burning, double-base propellant for use in shotguns and small handgun rounds. This variant of smokeless powder produces less overall energy than slower powders but burns more cleanly and quickly.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Ammo Part

IMR propellant for light rifle cartridges and some heavy handgun cartridges. This powder burns at a medium rate and produces a moderate amount of energy though it cannot be used in blowback handguns and shotguns as insufficient pressures will lead to incomplete burning, causing fouling.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Ammo Part

High-yield, slow burning ball propellant for large rifle rounds. This powder yields the most energy and burns the slowest, thus it is only suitable for use in large caliber rifle ammunition fired from long-barrel weapons.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Ammo Part

Variously sized handgun rounds salvaged from ammunition. These will be useful in crafting new ammunition.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Ammo Part

Variously sized handgun rounds salvaged from ammunition. These have alloy penetrators embedded in the bullet.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Ammo Part

Small lead buckshot pellets used in hunting shotguns. These can be melted down and cast into large slugs.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Ammo Part

Hardened steel dart round encased in a sabot. Though designed to be fired out of police shotguns to disable engine blocks, they perform decently well against body armor.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Ammo Part

Variously sized small-bore rifle bullets used in assault rifles. Military-manufactured and covered in a full metal jacket for optimized accuracy.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Ammo Part

Variously sized small-bore rifle bullets with alloy penetrators used in assault rifles. These are special-issue rounds designed to defeat armor at standard engagement ranges, at the cost of effectiveness against flesh.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Ammo Part

Full-size rifle bullets covered in a metal jacket. These are commonly used to load cartridges for hunting and military sniping use.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Ammo Part

Full-size rifle bullets with embedded alloy penetrators. Often found in special-issue cartridges used by military and special forces to defeat body armor from long range.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Ammo Part
